title: America's #1 Lady Gangster! Ma Barker's Killer Brood (Thriller, 1960) by Bill Karn

sources.title: America's #1 Lady Gangster! Ma Barker's Killer Brood (Thriller, 1960) by Bill Karn
sources.description:
Bullet-blistering story of America's No. 1 Female Gangster! 
Ma Barker and her four sons terrorize the 1930s South and Midwest with a string of kidnappings, robberies and murders, and even get to work with such famous criminals as Al Karpis, John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson, and Machine Gun Kelly.

Original title: Ma Barker's Killer Brood (1960) 

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/xthqqcCQRmU

This movie is subtitled in many languages

Director:  Bill Karn
Writer:  F. Paul Hall
Stars:  Lurene Tuttle, Tristram Coffin, Paul Dubov, Nelson Leigh, Myrna Dell, Victor Lundin
Genres: Colorized classics, Crime, Drama, Thriller
